text: Cheri Lynn Beasley (born February 14, 1966) is an American attorney and jurist. She was the chief justice of the North Carolina Supreme Court from 2019 to 2020. She was on the North Carolina Court of Appeals and as a district court judge in Cumberland County, North Carolina. She was the unsuccessful Democratic nominee for the United States Senate in the 2022 election. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from North Carolina
title: Cheri Beasley
